pos_mean_info_list.mean: 可爱的；迷人的；会传染的
接受者；接受打赌的人；捕获者

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指紧紧抓住、抓牢。
指粗暴而急迫的抓住。
指用手紧握或用臂紧抱。
指突然抓住某物，强调突然的猛烈动作。
最普通用词，不带感情色彩。指用手抓、取某东西或控制某物。
强调匆忙、紧急地抓、抓紧。
语气比grasp强，指用手的最大力量紧紧抓住。
指突然抢走，侧重动作更快或更具暴力性质。
普通用词，指需要占用空间、时间或精力等，其主语可以是人，也可以是一件事情。
较正式用词，通常指为某一专门目的而花费大量金钱、时间或精力。
指花费时间、金钱、劳力等。其主语是物，而不能由人充当，也不用被动形式。
普通用词，与cost基本同义，但主语必须是人。
指通过中间人传递信息，或以某种方式把人或物送到目的地。
指一往一返，相当于go and bring，去取了东西或带人再返回到出发处。
口语用词，与fetch基本同义，语气随便。
指使用车辆或机械设备把人或货物从一处运载到另一处。
指从说话人或说话人心目中所在处把某人或某物带离开，带到离说话者有一定距离的地方，与bring的方向正相反，侧重方向，不着重方式。
指从某处把人或物带到或拿到说话者所在的地点，强调方向，不着重方式。
指把物品从一个地方带到另一个地方，不涉及方向，只强调方式。
与receive同意，是receive的日常用法，侧重不带主观意愿地收下或接受。
强调主动地或自愿地接受，或者说，经过考虑后同意接受。
作“接受”讲时，强调准许或批准。
着重仅仅接到或收到这一支轮船或事实，而不含采取主动或积极行动的意思。

bilingual.source: He reached out a hand to take the change.
Could you please take out the rubbish?
Could you take out the rubbish first?
bilingual.target: 你能先把垃圾拿出去吗？

bilingual.source: Take anything you don't need out of your school bag.
bilingual.target: 把你不需要的东西从书包里拿出来。

bilingual.source: Take a little of everything and then have some more of the things you like.
bilingual.target: 每样都拿一点，然后再多拿一些你喜欢的。

bilingual.source: I never take wooden chopsticks or plastic forks when I buy takeaway food.
bilingual.target: 我买外卖时从不拿木筷子或塑料叉子。

bilingual.source: I think that Chen Liyan did the right thing by returning the money and refusing to take a single cent from Wang Zheng.
bilingual.target: 我认为陈丽燕做得对，把钱还了回去，并且拒绝拿王正的一分钱。

list.abstract: take（英[teɪk]，美[teɪk]），英语单词。作名词时，释义为一次拍摄的电影镜头；收入量；一次排版量。作动词时，释义为拿出；带走；携带。短语搭配为take care of（照顾）。例句为“Sally's mother plagued by these events, she lost the ability to take care of others.（莎莉的母亲受到这些事件的折磨，她失去了照顾他人的能力。）” take的第三人称单数为takes，现在分词为taking，过去分词为taken，过去式为took。其反义词为give、refuse、obviate；及物动词近义词有carry、adopt、have，不及物动词近义词有pick up、get access to。
T.A.K.E韩国著名音乐组合，2003年发行第一张专辑。韩国TAKE从属BLUE经纪公司·在中国TAKE是韩国KONA经纪公司旗下的艺人·。

yingyinNormal.en: When I was a kid, some guy took my favorite toy and threw it up there.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我小时候，有个家伙抢走了我最喜欢的玩具，把它丢在那里。

yingyinNormal.en: Here, take this. What's in here?
yingyinNormal.zh: 拿着这个。

yingyinNormal.en: Take it. Shoot the dog.
yingyinNormal.zh: 拿着。开枪把狗打死。

yingyinNormal.en: Just take the test, B. Stop it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 总之自己测试一下，B。别拿出来。

yingyinNormal.en: You wanna be a cleaner. Here. Take it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你想做一名清道夫，给，拿着。

yingyinNormal.en: Take it and go. And remember, one word...
yingyinNormal.zh: 拿着走吧，记住，敢说一句…

yingyinNormal.en: Take some. Really? I mean, are you sure?
yingyinNormal.zh: 拿一些吧。真的么？你肯定么？

yingyinNormal.en: If I take this away, you'll see the inside.
yingyinNormal.zh: 把这边拿开，你会看到里面。

yingyinNormal.en: Now take this money and get the hell outta here.
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在拿上这些钱，快滚吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Here. Take some. Pay me back when you can.
yingyinNormal.zh: 来吧，拿一些，等你有钱了再还我。

yingyinNormal.en: How? There's a gun in the hatch. Take it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 怎么阻止？小窗口里有把枪。拿起来。

yingyinNormal.en: Mr. Krabs, Plankton didn't take the secret formula.
yingyinNormal.zh: 蟹老板，痞老板没有拿秘方。
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge Out of Water》

yingyinNormal.en: Ice, ice, ice squares anyone? Take a napkin. Alright.
yingyinNormal.zh: 冰块？谁要冰块？拿张餐巾。

yingyinNormal.en: That's what changes you, farkle. Take it from me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那样才能改变你，宅男，给我拿着。

yingyinNormal.en: You didn't see him take the scalpel? Nobody saw him.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你没看见他拿手术刀？没人看到。

yingyinNormal.en: Hello. Welcome to Monica's. May I take your coat?
yingyinNormal.zh: 欢迎光临莫妮卡家，我能帮你拿外套吗？

yingyinNormal.en: You own the damn thing. Just take a freaking sweater!
yingyinNormal.zh: 还不都你说了算，痛快拿件毛衣就行了！

yingyinNormal.en: Men just take out wind?
yingyinNormal.zh: 男人就这样拿走我们的风？

yingyinNormal.en: Somebody just take this away from me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 快把这玩意拿走。

yingyinNormal.en: I don't want these. Just take them. Me either.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不要这些，拿走。我也是。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: require or use up (a specified amount of time)

examination_example.sentence: Airlines have simply changed the time a trip is meant to <highlight>take</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 航空公司只不过改变了一次旅行所需的时间。

examination_example.sentence: It <highlight>takes</highlight> about three weeks to a month to notice significant changes in your weight due to altering your training program.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 由于改变了训练计划，你大约需要三周到一个月的时间才能注意到你的体重所发生的显著变化。

examination_example.sentence: It <highlight>takes</highlight> collective scrutiny and acceptance to transform a discovery claim into a mature discovery.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 将一个发现声明转变为一个成熟的发现需要集体的审查和接受。

sense_info_list.en: make, undertake, or perform (an action or task)
sense_info_list.zh: 采取(行动); 执行(任务)

examination_example.sentence: Congress needs to <highlight>take</highlight> action to ensure net neutrality.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 国会需要采取行动确保网络中立性。

examination_example.sentence: Students who <highlight>take</highlight> a gap year are generally better prepared for and perform better in college than those who do not.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 选择间隔年的学生通常比未选择间隔年的学生对大学生活准备更充分，其在校表现也更好。

examination_example.sentence: Americans should <highlight>take</highlight> steps to protect their digital privacy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 美国人应该采取措施保护他们的数字隐私。

examination_example.sentence: It needs to put historical prejudices to one side and <highlight>take</highlight> some steps to address our urgent housing need.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它需要抛开历史偏见，采取一些措施来解决我们迫切的住房需求。

examination_example.sentence: As many <highlight>took</highlight> on the duty of trying to integrate reasoning and scientific philosophies into the world, the Renaissance was over.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当许多人承担起将推理和科学哲学融入世界的责任时，文艺复兴就结束了。

examination_example.sentence: They're more productive, more creative, and willing to <highlight>take</highlight> greater risks.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们更有生产力，更有创造力，并且愿意承担更大的风险。

examination_example.sentence: It must <highlight>take</highlight> responsibility for the signal it sends women about the social tape-measure they must use to determine their individual worth.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对于女性该用什么样的社会标尺来确定自己的个人价值这一问题，它（时尚产业）必须为其向女性所传达的信号负责。

examination_example.sentence: For one person, the goal may be to be <highlight>taken</highlight> more seriously and enhance their professional image.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对一个人来说，目标可能是想被他人更认真地对待，并提升自己的职业形象。

examination_example.sentence: Care was <highlight>taken</highlight> to see that all subjects, friends and strangers, were taken from the same population.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 悉心确保所有的实验对象，不管是朋友还是陌生人，都选自同一个族群。

examination_example.sentence: This scale <highlight>took</highlight> numerous factors into consideration.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这一评分等级考虑了许多因素。

sense_info_list.en: to accept or receive something

examination_example.sentence: It is wise to <highlight>take</highlight> such gifts with gratitude and grace.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 明智的做法是以感恩之心和优雅的风度接受这些礼物。

sense_info_list.en: be taught or examined in (a subject)
sense_info_list.zh: 学习课程; 参加考试

examination_example.sentence: Many students find themselves listing one major on their college applications, but switching to another after <highlight>taking</highlight> college classes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 许多学生发现自己在大学申请中列出了一个专业，但在上完大学课程后又转到了另一个专业。

examination_example.sentence: It seems worthless to <highlight>take</highlight> off-campus courses.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 学习校外课程似乎毫无价值。

sense_info_list.en: to happen

examination_example.sentence: Many of the most celebrated national figures have participated in historical events that have <highlight>taken</highlight> place within the EEOB's granite walls.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 许多最知名的国家级人物参与了发生在艾森豪威尔行政办公大楼(EEOB)花岗岩墙内的历史事件。

examination_example.sentence: A shift in the view of fire has <highlight>taken</highlight> place.
examination_example.sentence_trans: （人们）对火的看法发生了转变。

examination_example.sentence: The dearth of moral purpose frames not only the fact of such widespread phone hacking but the terms on which the trial <highlight>took</highlight> place.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 道德目的的缺失不仅体现在这样普遍的电话窃听的事实，也体现在审判发生所依据的法律条款上。

sense_info_list.en: to make somebody/something go from one level, situation, etc. to another

examination_example.sentence: It is not like you can <highlight>take</highlight> an unemployed waiter and train him to be a doctor in a few weeks.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这并不是说你可以在几周内把一个失业的服务员培养成一名医生。

examination_example.sentence: But too often we <highlight>take</highlight> this process too far and end up suppressing emotions, especially negative ones.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但很多时候我们往往把这个过程做得太过了，最终压抑了情绪，尤其是负面情绪。

examination_example.sentence: In physics, one approach <highlight>takes</highlight> this impulse for unification to its extreme, and seeks a theory of everything .
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在物理学里，有一种方法把这种对统一的追求发挥到了极致，并寻求一种能够解释一切的理论。

sense_info_list.zh: 持有(看法); 采取(态度)

examination_example.sentence: The author considers it a good sign that employers are <highlight>taking</highlight> a realistic attitude to degrees.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 作者认为，雇主正在采取现实的态度对待学位是一个好迹象。

examination_example.sentence: Next time you talk with someone who <highlight>takes</highlight> a stand, ask them to give you a reason for their view.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 下次你和有明确立场的人谈话时，请他们给你一个他们持该观点的理由。

sense_info_list.en: get possession or use of

examination_example.sentence: They aren't interested in <highlight>taking</highlight> any chances.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们对利用机会不感兴趣。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Taking</highlight> a gap year to figure things out initially can help prevent stress and save money later on.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 利用间隔年一开始就把事情弄清楚有助于预防压力，还能为以后省钱。

examination_example.sentence: Many first-generation students struggle to navigate the middle-class culture of higher education and <highlight>take</highlight> advantage of college resources.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 很多第一代的学生挣扎着应对高等教育中的中产阶级文化，利用大学资源。

examination_example.sentence: This kind of nonsense, when <highlight>taken</highlight> up by broadcasters and the lay press, generates both health scares and short-lived dietary enthusiasms.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当这类无稽之被广播公司和非专业刊物接受时，会引起健康恐慌和短暂的饮食狂热。

examination_example.sentence: But her appeal was considered a failure: only 24 companies <highlight>took</highlight> it up.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但大家认为她的呼吁是失败的：只有24家公司接受了。

sense_info_list.en: use as an instance or example in support of an argument

examination_example.sentence: To <highlight>take</highlight> an obvious example, the pandemic meant that there were still clear shortages of doctors, nurses and other medical personnel.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 举个明显的例子，大流行病意味着医生、护士和其他医务人员仍明显短缺。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Take</highlight> the toddler.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 以学步期儿童为例。

examination_example.sentence: First, consumers may <highlight>take</highlight> CSR spending as a "signal" that a company's products are of high quality.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 首先，消费者可能会将企业社会责任支出视为公司产品高质量的“信号”。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Takes</highlight> republicans as his potential allies.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 把共和党人视为他的潜在盟友。

sense_info_list.zh: 夺取; 攻占; 控制

examination_example.sentence: In so doing they give composure to a segment of the inarticulate environment in which they <highlight>take</highlight> their stand.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这样一来，他们(无家可归者)就将宁静赋予了他们立足的那一小块难以名状的地方。

examination_example.sentence: Unlike with mining claims, the community <highlight>takes</highlight> control of what happens next.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 与采矿索赔不同，社区控制了接下来发生的事情。

examination_example.sentence: While the rest of the world <highlight>takes</highlight> the lead, notably China and Europe, the United States is also seeing a remarkable shift.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当世界其他地区，特别是中国和欧洲领先的时候，美国也正经历一个显著的转变。

examination_example.sentence: Women <highlight>take</highlight> the lead.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 女性带头。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Taking</highlight> up odd jobs.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 打零工。

examination_example.sentence: A lot of students <highlight>take</highlight> up law as their profession due to the attraction of financial rewards.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 由于经济回报的吸引力，许多学生把法律作为他们的职业。

sense_info_list.en: occupy (a place or position)

examination_example.sentence: Millennials may not be that interested in <highlight>taking</highlight> their place.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 千禧一代可能对取代他们的位置不那么感兴趣。

sense_info_list.en: [with obj. and adverbial of direction]remove (someone or something) from a particular place

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Take</highlight> away babies' appetite.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 使婴儿倒胃口。

sense_info_list.en: a particular version of or approach to something

examination_example.sentence: At issue was the latest <highlight>take</highlight> of the Federal Communications Commission on net neutrality.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 争论的焦点是联邦通信委员会对网络中立性的最新看法。

examination_example.sentence: Seven Days, consists of a single beautiful black-and-white photograph <highlight>taken</highlight> on an epic walk.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 《七天》，由一张在史诗般的散步中拍摄的美丽黑白照片组成。

sense_info_list.zh: 拍(照); 镜头; 场景

examination_example.sentence: Reading becomes the default state from which you temporarily surface to <highlight>take</highlight> care of business, before dropping back down.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 阅读成了你的默认状态。在这种状态下，你可以冒个泡，临时处理一下工作，然后再沉浸到阅读中。

examination_example.sentence: Manufacturing has <highlight>taken</highlight> a significant hit during recent decades.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 近几十年来，制造业遭受了重大打击。

examination_example.sentence: It involves <highlight>taking</highlight> out all the nature reserves and removing thousands of people from their homes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这包括拆除所有的自然保护区，并让成千上万的人离开家园。

sense_info_list.zh: (take a page from)向...学习; 模仿

examination_example.sentence: Rosenberg argues convincingly that public-health advocates ought to <highlight>take</highlight> a page from advertisers, so skilled at applying peer pressure.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Rosenberg令人信服地主张公共卫生倡导者应向擅长施加同侪压力的广告商学习。

examination_example.sentence: They <highlight>take</highlight> part-time work because this is all they can get.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们从事兼职工作，因为这是他们能得到的全部。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Taking</highlight> our own bags to the grocery store or quitting plastic straws, for example, will accomplish little and require very little of us.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如，带着我们自己的包去杂货店或放弃使用塑料吸管，将会收效甚微，对我们的要求也很低。

examination_example.sentence: You can do activities such as golf and tennis or <highlight>take</highlight> a walk with others and still be socially distant.

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 取者；做…之人；下赌注的人；接受者
v. 再拿；再进行；重考；补考；重拍；重录；再夺取；重新占领；重获
v. 赶超；超过；突然降临在…上；超越；赶上；压倒；使突然受不了
n. 外卖店；外卖食品；向后挥动；要点

word_family.mean: v. 拿；取；拿出；带走；携带；接受；吃；喝；采取；执行；需要；生根；开始生长；需带有；学习，读，修（课程）；需要…时间；容纳；乘坐，搭乘（交通工具）

sense_info_list.en: get hold of

examination_example.sentence: In May this year, Burberry announced it was <highlight>taking</highlight> fur out of its catwalk shows and reviewing its use elsewhere in the business.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 今年5月，博柏利宣布将皮草从时装秀中撤出，并重新审视其在其他行业的应用。

examination_example.sentence: Works of art that sustained smoke damage were being <highlight>taken</highlight> to the Louvre.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 遭受烟雾破坏的艺术品被带到卢浮宫。

examination_example.sentence: Such levies are no universal remedy as the amounts raised would be tiny compared with what has been <highlight>taken</highlight> away by central government since 2010.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这类税收并不是万能的，因为与2010年以来中央政府征收的税收相比，征收的金额微不足道。

sense_info_list.zh: 采取(措施); 采用(方法)

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Take</highlight> measures to lower the cost of food products.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 采取措施降低食品成本。

examination_example.sentence: The so-called "ghostwriting" can <highlight>take</highlight> various forms: books, articles, autobiographies, and even social media posts.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所谓的“代笔”可以采用各种形式：书籍、文章、自传，甚至社交媒体帖子。

examination_example.sentence: The UK will <highlight>take</highlight> new measures to boost tourism.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 英国将采取新措施促进旅游业发展。

examination_example.sentence: This is opposed to the traditional format of presenting to the industry, <highlight>taking</highlight> orders for production and becoming available in six months' time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这与向行业展示、接受生产订单并在六个月内供货的传统形式相反。

sense_info_list.en: get possession or use of

examination_example.sentence: But I think it will <highlight>take</highlight> a very long time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但我认为这需要很长时间。

examination_example.sentence: It <highlight>takes</highlight> time for local governments to reach consensus.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 地方政府需要时间才能达成共识。

examination_example.sentence: We often think of drawing as something that <highlight>takes</highlight> inborn talent.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们经常认为绘画需要天赋。

examination_example.sentence: As somebody who started <highlight>taking</highlight> piano lessons at the age of five, that experience changed me.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 作为一个从五岁开始学习钢琴的人，那段经历改变了我。

examination_example.sentence: He also admits that if he had children of his own, he would encourage them to <highlight>take</highlight> music lessons and go to university.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他还承认，如果他有自己的孩子，他会鼓励他们去上音乐课和大学。

examination_example.sentence: There has been a 28.1% decline in students <highlight>taking</highlight> creative subjects at high schools since 2014.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 自2014年以来，高中学习创意类课程的学生人数下降了28.1%，但令人高兴的是，艺术和设计类课程的人数最近有所增加。

examination_example.sentence: Work is less about what they can contribute but more about what they can <highlight>take</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 工作不是关于他们能贡献什么，而是关于他们能得到什么。

examination_example.sentence: This teaches them to be understanding of and sympathetic towards others—qualities sure to <highlight>take</highlight> them a long way in life.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这教导他们理解和同情他人，这些品质一定能让他们的人生之路走得长远。

examination_example.sentence: With the use of driverless vehicles seemingly inevitable, mining companies in the vast Australian desert state of Western Australia are definitely <highlight>taking</highlight> the lead.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 随着无人驾驶汽车的使用似乎不可避免，位于澳大利亚广袤沙漠地带的西澳大利亚州的矿业公司无疑在这方面处于领先地位。

examination_example.sentence: They <highlight>take</highlight> pop stars as their idols, seeking every chance to meet them in person at great expenses.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们把流行音乐歌星当成偶像，不惜一切代价寻找与他们见面的机会。

examination_example.sentence: The subject of automation and its role in our economy has <highlight>taken</highlight> hold in American public discourse.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 自动化的主题及其在我们经济中的作用已经在美国公众的讨论中占据了一席之地。

examination_example.sentence: Richemont hit the headlines in May for <highlight>taking</highlight> back £437 million of watches for destruction to avoid marked-down prices.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 5月，历峰收回并销毁4.37亿英镑的手表以避免降价，成为了头条新闻。

examination_example.sentence: Schellenberg <highlight>took</highlight> that news in stride while continuing to cast a skeptical eye on the research in his field.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Schellenberg从容地接受了这一消息，同时继续对他所在领域的研究持怀疑态度。

examination_example.sentence: The willingness to <highlight>take</highlight> risks may inspire others to be more courageous.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 冒险的意愿可能会激励其他人变得更加勇敢。

sense_info_list.zh: (take all the credit for)把所有的功劳归于
(take out of)减去; 抽出(金额)

word_usage.usage: take是英语中含义最多、搭配能力最强的动词之一，基本义为“拿，取，带，抓”，指用手取物、接受东西、把人或物移到某处，可根据上下文灵活理解。
take place是不及物的短语动词，不可用于被动结构。
take part in表示“参加某项活动”，如表示“参加考试”，用take the examination。
take time 意为“费时间，花工夫”；take one's time 意为“慢慢来，从容不迫”。
表示“轮流做某事”时，可以用take turns或take one's/a turn，没有take turn形式。

examination_example.sentence: Surprisingly, the Space Roaster concept—should it go ahead—will not be the first attempt to <highlight>take</highlight> coffee into space.

examination_example.sentence: It was a great marketing tool because kids were <highlight>taking</highlight> that TV show to school with them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是一种很好的营销工具，因为孩子们会把电视节目带去学校。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Take</highlight> steps to reduce nicotine in their products.

examination_example.sentence: How long people <highlight>took</highlight> to reach the top of their career.

examination_example.sentence: It <highlight>takes</highlight> great efforts for children to grasp the concept of number words.

examination_example.sentence: It <highlight>takes</highlight> too long a time.

examination_example.sentence: But work stress can <highlight>take</highlight> many different forms.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是工作压力有很多种形式。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Taking</highlight> whatever materials are handy and tinkering with them is a simple way to engage those important "maker" skills.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 使用任何方便的材料并对其进行修补是培养那些重要的“创客”技能的简单方法。

examination_example.sentence: Farmers complain that land is being <highlight>taken</highlight> out of use by generously subsidised tree plantations.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 农民们抱怨土地被慷慨补贴的树木种植园占用。

examination_example.sentence: If you're like most people, you end up buying the large (and <highlight>taking</highlight> a bathroom break midshow) .
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果您像大多数人一样，您最终会购买大号的(并在演出中途上个厕所)。

examination_example.sentence: Tourists <highlight>taking</highlight> a holiday in the Indonesian island of Bali are facing a new $ 14-per-person tax.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 到印度尼西亚巴厘岛度假的游客将面临每人14美元的新税收。

sense_info_list.zh: 同意负责; 承担(责任)

examination_example.sentence: Parents should their child to <highlight>take</highlight> the risks needed to learn and grow.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 父母应该让孩子承担学习和成长所需的风险。

examination_example.sentence: She would like to have everything <highlight>taken</highlight> care of.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她想把一切都处理好。

examination_example.sentence: They should <highlight>take</highlight> more responsibility at work.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们应该在工作中承担更多的责任。

examination_example.sentence: They <highlight>take</highlight> touching as a cultural norm in social interactions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们认为触摸是社会交往中的一种文化规范。

examination_example.sentence: They need to be <highlight>taken</highlight> seriously.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们需要被认真对待。

examination_example.sentence: It doesn't <highlight>take</highlight> donations and doesn't want to be seen as a charity.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它不接受捐赠，也不想被视为慈善机构。

examination_example.sentence: The study included healthy, educated adults who <highlight>took</highlight> standard tests of memory.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这项研究包括接受过标准记忆测试的健康、受过教育的成年人。

examination_example.sentence: He was <highlight>taken</highlight> to hospital in an ambulance.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他被救护车送往医院。

examination_example.sentence: A friend recently <highlight>took</highlight> her mother to visit an expensive assisted living/nursing home near my town.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一位朋友最近带她妈妈去了我镇附近一家昂贵的养老院。

examination_example.sentence: They <highlight>took</highlight> two passengers only.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们只载了两名乘客。

examination_example.sentence: If anything is really wrong, you can just <highlight>take</highlight> photographs of the damage.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果真的出了什么问题，你可以拍下损坏处的照片。

examination_example.sentence: A NASA satellite orbiting over Portugal <highlight>took</highlight> photographs that reveal the effects of pollution from ships.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一颗在葡萄牙上空运行的美国宇航局卫星拍摄的照片揭示了船舶污染的影响。

examination_example.sentence: What has caused the thick clouds in the photos <highlight>taken</highlight> by NASA satellite?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 是什么导致了NASA卫星拍摄的照片中的浓云？

examination_example.sentence: By <highlight>taking</highlight> its quality into account.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 考虑到它的质量。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Taking</highlight> into account economic need beyond that absolute measure, the Institute for Policy Studies found that 140 million people are poor or low-income.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 考虑到这一绝对指标之外的经济需求，政策研究所发现1.4亿人是穷人或低收入者。

examination_example.sentence: You don't have to <highlight>take</highlight> anyone else into consideration and can do whatever you please.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你不必考虑其他任何人，你可以做任何你想做的事情。

examination_example.sentence: Each March, this tiny village swells up in numbers, because it is located in the middle of a race that <highlight>takes</highlight> place every year.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每年三月，这个小村庄的人数都会增加，因为其位于每年举行的比赛赛段的中间地点。

examination_example.sentence: Every year an average of 1, 218 nose and 2, 479 ear removals <highlight>took</highlight> place between 2010 and 2016.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 2010年到2016年，每年平均有1218个鼻子和2479个耳朵被切除。

examination_example.sentence: Where is the conversation <highlight>taking</highlight> place?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对话发生在哪里？

examination_example.sentence: Under the old system in America, a mother was supposed to stay home and <highlight>take</highlight> care of her children.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在美国古老的制度下，母亲应该呆在家里照顾孩子。

examination_example.sentence: It helps us <highlight>take</highlight> care of problems more efficiently.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它帮助我们更有效地处理问题。

examination_example.sentence: Spending time alone also allows you to more efficiently <highlight>take</highlight> care of problems.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 独处也能让你更有效地处理问题。

examination_example.sentence: Imagine that this drug were simple to make, safe to <highlight>take</highlight>, and could be had for free.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 想象一下，这种药制作简单，服用安全，还可以免费获得。

examination_example.sentence: So we're eating out or <highlight>taking</highlight> in, and we don't sit down-or we do, but we hurry.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所以我们在外面吃饭或吃东西，不管坐下还是不坐下(吃)，但是我们都很块。

examination_example.sentence: "It still has to go into a container. "That is, in part, why smaller and softer containers have <highlight>taken</highlight> off-they fit into backpacks.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “它必须放入容器中。”这在一定程度上就是为什么更小、更柔软的容器可以放进背包的原因。

examination_example.sentence: Now that sales are <highlight>taking</highlight> off, the vast majority of bike dealers are asking Cocalis when he'll make an ebike available.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现在销量突然开始上升，绝大多数自行车经销商都在问Cocalis什么时候能推出电动自行车。

examination_example.sentence: Forests are gradually <highlight>taking</highlight> more land in America and Australia.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在美国和澳大利亚，森林正逐渐占据更多的土地。

examination_example.sentence: While remote workers help to keep the café full in quiet times, they can <highlight>take</highlight> up the valuable table space in busy periods.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然远程工作的人有助于保持咖啡馆在清闲时满座，但他们也会在忙碌时段占用宝贵的餐桌空间。

examination_example.sentence: I finally had the opportunity to learn about Asian Americans like myself when I <highlight>took</highlight> an introductory class on Asian-American history in college.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当我在大学里上了一堂关于亚裔美国人历史的入门课时，我终于有机会了解像我这样的亚裔美国人。

examination_example.sentence: When <highlight>taking</highlight> a class in college, the author realized that a lot of information was left out of the textbooks he studied.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在大学上课的时候，作者意识到自己学习的课本中遗漏了很多信息。

examination_example.sentence: The dog owner's beloved 10-year-old dog named Buddy <highlight>took</highlight> an unexpected 16-hour flight to Tokyo following a mix-up by the airline.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 由于航空公司搞错了，狗主人心爱的10岁狗狗Buddy乘坐了16个小时的飞机，意外地飞到了东京。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Take</highlight> a train home.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 坐火车回家。

examination_example.sentence_trans: 该村169名登记选民中的大多数参加了市政厅会议。

examination_example.sentence: The metal lunch box craze lasted until the mid-1980s, when plastic <highlight>took</highlight> over.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 金属饭盒热潮一直持续到1980年代中期，直到被塑料饭盒代替。

examination_example.sentence: I <highlight>took</highlight> pride in the job nobody wanted.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我为这份没人要的工作感到自豪。

examination_example.sentence_trans: 由于无法购买粮食或自己种植，饥饿的人们走在街头。

word_usage.usage: take part in表示“参加某项活动”，如表示“参加考试”，用take the examination。
take place是不及物的短语动词，不可用于被动结构。
take time 意为“费时间，花工夫”；take one's time 意为“慢慢来，从容不迫”。
take是英语中含义最多、搭配能力最强的动词之一，基本义为“拿，取，带，抓”，指用手取物、接受东西、把人或物移到某处，可根据上下文灵活理解。
表示“轮流做某事”时，可以用take turns或take one's/a turn，没有take turn形式。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 赶超；超过；突然降临在…上；超越；赶上；压倒；使突然受不了
n. 外卖店；外卖食品；向后挥动；要点

word_family.mean: v. 拿；取；拿出；带走；携带；接受；吃；喝；采取；执行；需要；生根；开始生长；需带有；学习，读，修（课程）；需要…时间；容纳；乘坐，搭乘（交通工具）

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 拿起；接受；开始(从事)；占用
采取行动；提出诉讼；开始起作用
包括；吸收；收留；领会；欺骗
去掉；脱下；(飞机)起飞；突然成功；调离
收回；同意退货；使回忆起

sense_info_list.en: get possession or use of

examination_example.sentence: Currently, about 35,000 works are being displayed in over 300 rooms in the Louvre, and it would <highlight>take</highlight> a lifetime to see everything.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 目前，大约有35，000件作品正在卢浮宫的300多个房间里展出，想要看完所有的东西需要花一生的时间。

examination_example.sentence: Parents might <highlight>take</highlight> this chance to step in and make their own summer reading list and plan a family trip to the library.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 家长们可能会借此机会制定自己的暑期阅读清单，计划一次全家去图书馆的旅行。

examination_example.sentence: If you are a fruit grower — or would like to become one — <highlight>take</highlight> advantage of Apple Day to see what's around.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你是一名果农——或者想成为一名果农——那就利用“苹果节”来了解下相关情况吧。

sense_info_list.en: get hold of

examination_example.sentence: And his dad, Albert, <highlight>took</highlight> the money my dad earned and used it to pay family expenses.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他的父亲Albert拿走了我父亲挣的钱，并用这些钱支付了家庭开支。

examination_example.sentence: You have to have one only to <highlight>take</highlight> books out.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你必须要用这个才能把书取出来。

examination_example.sentence: I'm looking for someone to <highlight>take</highlight> it while I'm away.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我想找个人在我外出时拿着它。

examination_example.sentence: We have done quite enough work for the morning; now let's <highlight>take</highlight> a break.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 今天上午我们干得够多了；现在我们休息一下。

examination_example.sentence: She added that she had a line of staff at her door wanting to <highlight>take</highlight> the training.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她补充说，她门口有一排员工想参加培训。

examination_example.sentence: I can <highlight>take</highlight> your order over the phone.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我可以在电话里为您点菜。

examination_example.sentence: The French <highlight>take</highlight> their 35-hour workweek seriously.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 法国人认真对待他们每周35小时的工作时间。

examination_example.sentence: I <highlight>took</highlight> his relative silence to be offensive.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我认为他的相对沉默是一种冒犯。

examination_example.sentence: I <highlight>take</highlight> that as a given.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我认为这是理所当然的。

examination_example.sentence: He <highlight>took</highlight> a balloon flight.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他乘热气球飞行。

examination_example.sentence: I <highlight>took</highlight> a bus to City Hall, but I can't find the place.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我乘公共汽车去市政厅，但是我找不到那个地方。

examination_example.sentence: To go there, you should <highlight>take</highlight> the bus at Grand Hotel, over there.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 要去那里，你得在那边的Grand饭店坐公共汽车。

examination_example.sentence: She quitted her job and <highlight>took</highlight> the fashion-design course.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她辞掉工作，参加了时装设计课程。

examination_example.sentence: I've <highlight>taken</highlight> so many Udemy courses, and it's such a great feeling to get my brain working again.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我参加了Udemy上的很多课程，让大脑重新运转的感觉真好。

examination_example.sentence: One thing I had developed an interest in was sewing, so I <highlight>took</highlight> a sewing course at a community college.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我对缝纫产生了兴趣，所以参加了一所社区大学的缝纫课程。

examination_example.sentence: To improve your note- <highlight>taking </highlight> skills.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 提高你记笔记的技巧。

examination_example.sentence: Imaginative ideas die away if not <highlight>taken</highlight> in time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有创意的想法如果不及时记录下来就会消失。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 采取(行动); 执行(任务)
服用; 使用; (take in)吸收
(与名词连用, 表示举动/动作等)
采用(形式); 就任(职位)

sense_info_list.en: make, undertake, or perform (an action or task)
sense_info_list.zh: 采取(行动); 执行(任务)

examination_example.sentence: Lydia runs four or five (五) times a week and <highlight>takes</highlight> a daily walk with her two dogs.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 莉迪亚一周跑四五次，每天和她的两只狗一起散步。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Taking</highlight> exercise is the best way to get energy again.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 锻炼是恢复精力的最好方法。

examination_example.sentence: It is also a perfect opportunity (机会) to encourage others to <highlight>take</highlight> their first step toward becoming a volunteer.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这也是鼓励他人向成为志愿者迈出第一步的绝佳机会。

sense_info_list.en: [with obj. and adverbial of direction]remove (someone or something) from a particular place

examination_example.sentence: David, could you please sweep the floor and <highlight>take</highlight> out the trash?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大卫，你能扫下地，再扔个垃圾吗？

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Take</highlight> the dumplings out when they float (漂浮) to the surface.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当饺子浮到水面时，将它们取出。

examination_example.sentence: At the end of the class, the teacher <highlight>took</highlight> all the answer papers and started reading each one of them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 下课时，老师收走所有的答卷，开始逐一阅读。

sense_info_list.en: be taught or examined in (a subject)

examination_example.sentence: I <highlight>take</highlight> singing classes every weekend.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我每个周末都上声乐课。

examination_example.sentence: He often <highlight>takes</highlight> part in club activities and gets along easily with people.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他经常参加社团活动，而且与人相处融洽。

examination_example.sentence: How many students around the world <highlight>took</highlight> part in the research?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 全世界有多少学生参与了这项研究？

sense_info_list.en: get hold of

examination_example.sentence: If you're not sure about your pronunciation when asking the way, you'd better <highlight>take</highlight> a map or a picture of the place where you want to go.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果问路的时候对自己的发音不太确定，最好带张地图或想去的地方的照片。

examination_example.sentence: The elephant, seeing that the crocodile had no way of reaching their goal, raised his long trunk, and <highlight>took</highlight> down the hat quite easily.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大象见鳄鱼没有办法达成他们的目标，便抬起长长的鼻子，相当轻松地取下了帽子。

examination_example.sentence: I <highlight>took</highlight> the flower with tears and said, "Thanks a lot! You have picked up the best one."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我含着泪接过那朵花说：“多谢！你选到了最好的一朵。”

sense_info_list.en: to photograph

examination_example.sentence: I've <highlight>taken</highlight> some photos of Shanghai and you can see what it looks like.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我拍了一些上海的照片，你可以看到它的样子。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Taking</highlight> the perfect photo takes time and practice.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 拍出完美的照片需要时间和练习。

examination_example.sentence: The pictures were <highlight>taken</highlight> at different distances from Mars.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些照片是在离火星不同的距离拍摄的。

sense_info_list.en: require or use up (a specified amount of time)

examination_example.sentence: People have asked Willard why he chose to do something that needed effort and <highlight>took</highlight> time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人们问威拉德，为什么他选择做一些需要精力和时间的事情。

examination_example.sentence: It <highlight>takes</highlight> about an hour to walk to the top of the Baiyun Mountain from here.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从这里步行到白云山山顶大约需要一个小时。

examination_example.sentence: It <highlight>takes</highlight> most people many years to find this out.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大多数人需要很多年才能发现这一点。

sense_info_list.en: to happen

examination_example.sentence: Her life shows the great changes have <highlight>taken</highlight> place in the village.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她的生活表明这个村庄发生了巨大的变化。

examination_example.sentence: Where does the conversation probably <highlight>take</highlight> place?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这场对话可能发生在哪里？

examination_example.sentence: Why have such changes <highlight>taken</highlight> place?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为什么会发生这样的变化？

sense_info_list.en: use as a route or a means of transport

examination_example.sentence: Which turning should the man <highlight>take</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这个人应该在哪个岔路口转弯？

examination_example.sentence: So try to walk, ride a bike or <highlight>take</highlight> a bus.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因此，请尝试步行、骑自行车或乘坐公共汽车。

examination_example.sentence: Whether it is to get to the store or get home, or if it is climbing the stairs instead of <highlight>taking</highlight> the lift, remembering a "Because I can" idea is an easy way to add more activities to your life.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 无论是去商店还是回家，或者是爬楼梯而不是乘电梯，记住“因为我能行”的想法，是为你的生活增加更多活动的简单方法。

sense_info_list.en: accompany or guide (someone) to a specified place

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Take</highlight> students back to school
examination_example.sentence_trans: 带学生回学校

examination_example.sentence: Let me <highlight>take</highlight> you to Center Hospital.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 让我带你去中心医院。

examination_example.sentence: "On most days after school," She says, "I <highlight>take</highlight> my son to basketball training and my daughter to dancing and piano lessons."
examination_example.sentence_trans: “放学后的大部分时间，”她说，“我带儿子去参加篮球训练，带女儿去上舞蹈课和钢琴课。”

sense_info_list.zh: 服用; 使用; (take in)吸收

examination_example.sentence: Alex's mum needs to make sure her patients <highlight>take</highlight> medicine on time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 亚历克斯的妈妈需要确保她的病人按时服药。

examination_example.sentence: As many as one in twelve 12-year-olds have <highlight>taken</highlight> drugs.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 多达十二分之一的 12 岁儿童吸毒。

examination_example.sentence: Salt <highlight>takes</highlight> in plenty of water, so most bacteria (细菌) can not live in a salty environment.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 盐会吸收大量水分，因此大多数细菌无法在含盐环境中生存。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Taking</highlight> care of your garden.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 照看你的花园。

examination_example.sentence: Some people even think that it should be <highlight>taken</highlight> care of by their parents.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有些人甚至认为应该由父母来照顾。

examination_example.sentence: There, the swan was checked, treated and <highlight>taken</highlight> good care of.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在那里，天鹅被检查，治疗和照顾得很好。

sense_info_list.en: [with obj. and usu. with adverbial]carry or bring with one; convey

examination_example.sentence: When were potatoes <highlight>taken</highlight> to North America?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 土豆是什么时候被带到北美的？

sense_info_list.en: used with nouns to say that sb is doing something, performing an action, etc.
sense_info_list.zh: (与名词连用, 表示举动/动作等)

examination_example.sentence: If necessary, just <highlight>take</highlight> a deep breath and smile before speaking.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果有必要，在讲话前深呼吸并微笑。

examination_example.sentence: An old man was <highlight>taking</highlight> a walk down a hill cheerfully.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一位老人正在愉快地下山散步。

sense_info_list.en: use or have ready to use

examination_example.sentence: Make sure the vaccine is widely <highlight>taken</highlight> all over the country.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 确保疫苗在全国广泛使用。

examination_example.sentence: Miss White was glad that she would <highlight>take</highlight> the chance.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 怀特小姐很高兴她会抓住这个机会。

examination_example.sentence: They <highlight>take</highlight> coloring, protein (蛋白质) and fats from these plants and mix them together.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们从这些植物中提取色素、蛋白质和脂肪，然后将它们混合在一起。

sense_info_list.en: to accept or receive something

examination_example.sentence: I hope my idea can be <highlight>taken</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我希望我的想法能被采纳。

examination_example.sentence: The bus can <highlight>take</highlight> you directly to the Art Festival.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 公共汽车可以直接带你去艺术节。

examination_example.sentence: They think public traffic in China is very fast and cheap, which can <highlight>take</highlight> them anywhere easily.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们认为中国的公共交通既快捷又便宜，能轻易地将他们带到任何地方。

sense_info_list.en: to find out and record something; to write something down

examination_example.sentence: Many students become busy <highlight>taking</highlight> notes and they may fail to follow the teacher.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 许多学生变得忙于记笔记，他们可能无法跟上老师。

examination_example.sentence: The first group <highlight>took</highlight> notes by hand.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 第一组用手做笔记。

examination_example.sentence: She always sat at the back of the classroom, reading or <highlight>taking</highlight> notes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她总是坐在教室的后面，看书或做笔记。

sense_info_list.en: occupy (a place or position)

examination_example.sentence: China is now <highlight>taking</highlight> the lead.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 中国现在处于领先地位。

examination_example.sentence: Telemedicine can <highlight>take</highlight> the place of usual health care.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 远程医疗可以取代平时的医疗保健。

examination_example.sentence: Robots are already <highlight>taking</highlight> over the world.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 机器人已经控制了世界。

examination_example.sentence: We're going to let you <highlight>take</highlight> over dinnertime.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们会让你接管晚餐时间。

sense_info_list.en: bring into a specified state

examination_example.sentence: It was a spelling mistake that <highlight>took</highlight> the couple 600 kilometres from their destination.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 正是一个拼写错误，使这对夫妇偏离他们的目的地600公里。

sense_info_list.en: to get something from a particular source

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Taken</highlight> from Little Women.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 取材于《小妇人》。

examination_example.sentence: This passage is probably <highlight>taken</highlight> from a history magazine.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这段话可能是从一本历史杂志上摘录的。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Taken</highlight> from The Railway Children.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 取材于《铁路儿童》。

examination_example.sentence: Some people might say they are going to <highlight>take</highlight> up a hobby like painting or taking photos.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有些人可能会说他们打算从事一项爱好，比如画画或拍照。

examination_example.sentence: A mirror is hung opposite a window to <highlight>take</highlight> in the outside scenery.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 窗户对面挂着一面镜子，用来欣赏外面的风景。

examination_example.sentence: The players <highlight>take</highlight> turns placing the stones on the game board.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 玩家轮流把石子放在棋盘上。

examination_example.sentence: They were supposed to be <highlight>taking</highlight> turns on the swing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们应该轮流荡秋千。

sense_info_list.en: to test or measure something

examination_example.sentence: Have you <highlight>taken</highlight> your temperature?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你量过体温了吗？

examination_example.sentence: Nowadays you are supposed to have your temperature <highlight>taken</highlight> before you enter the school.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现在你应该在进学校之前测一下体温。

sense_info_list.en: to react to something/somebody in a particular way

examination_example.sentence: The suggestion was <highlight>taken</highlight> seriously about 10 years ago.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这个建议大约在10年前被认真对待。

examination_example.sentence: Working hard first and <highlight>taking</highlight> it easy gradually.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 先努力，再慢慢放松。

sense_info_list.en: to have a particular form, position or state
sense_info_list.zh: 采用(形式); 就任(职位)

examination_example.sentence: Jobs that used to be done by human beings are now being <highlight>taken</highlight> by robots.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 过去由人类完成的工作现在被机器人取代了。

examination_example.sentence: In fact all the villages here have <highlight>taken</highlight> on a new look.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 事实上，这里所有的村庄都焕然一新。

examination_example.sentence: But that didn't stop these three women from <highlight>taking</highlight> off and doing big things.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但这并没有阻止这三个女人离开去做大事。

word_usage.usage: take是英语中含义最多、搭配能力最强的动词之一，基本义为“拿，取，带，抓”，指用手取物、接受东西、把人或物移到某处，可根据上下文灵活理解。
take place是不及物的短语动词，不可用于被动结构。
take part in表示“参加某项活动”，如表示“参加考试”，用take the examination。
take time 意为“费时间，花工夫”；take one's time 意为“慢慢来，从容不迫”。
表示“轮流做某事”时，可以用take turns或take one's/a turn，没有take turn形式。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指从某处把人或物带到说话者所在的地点，强调方向，不着重方式。
指把物品从一个地方带到另一个地方，不涉及方向，只强调方式。
指从说话人或说话人心目中所在处把某人或某物带离开，带到离说话者有一定距离的地方，与bring的方向正相反，侧重方向，不着重方式。
强调主观上自愿地接受或同意建议、邀请等；也指认为某人或某物够好而接受。
侧重接到或收到某一事物，不含采取主动或积极行动的意思。
与receive同义，为receive的日常用法，侧重不带主观意愿地收下或接受。
指花费时间、金钱、劳力等。其主语是物，而不能由人充当，也不用被动形式。
普通用词，与cost基本同义，但主语必须是人。
主语可以是人，也可以是事物，通常以 it 作形式主语，可后接双宾语。
